seasonal_adjustments.energy_adjustment: Increased energy requirement due to cooler autumn temperatures to maintain body heat.
seasonal_adjustments.protein_adjustment: Slight increase in protein to support growth and feather development as birds approach laying age.
seasonal_adjustments.water_considerations: Ensure access to clean, unfrozen water as temperatures drop, and monitor water intake to prevent dehydration.

additional_recommendations: Monitor bird health regularly for any signs of nutritional deficiencies or illnesses.
Provide adequate space and comfortable housing to reduce stress and promote healthy growth.
Consider adding prebiotics or probiotics to the feed to enhance gut health and nutrient absorption.
